name: Pong (itch) (Cat (procrastinates))
description:
the classic game of pong! 

made following a tutorial, with some extra additions :)

singleplayer is versus an ai, use W and S or arrow keys to move

multiplayer is local, player 1 uses W and S and player 2 uses arrow keys

5 points to win! 

if the game crashes on start, reload the page :)
